content:
The Pangeo Showcase today (going on right now) is on Jupyter GIS and looks super cool (think GIS in JupyterLab w/ some collaborative features). The presentation is being recorded as well so hopefully should be on YouTube in a few days.

https://jupytergis.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
https://www.pangeo.io/showcase

There's also a GeoJupyter community w/ hackathons, meetings, etc. : https://geojupyter.org/

And they're doing interviews to gather input / feedback for Jupyter GIS dev as well.
